reviews.Title: When perfection meets performance!
reviews.Comment:
There are some phones that look good but lack in performance while there are some phones that perform well but don't look that classy!

iPhone 11 Pro Max is a combination of both. Aesthetically it's a beauty, and performance-wise it's a beast. Apple has been successful in reaching a level where no company has ever reached. I have been using this phone since a year now and there are no complains at all. They even improved the battery life in this one.
